description.narrative: This activity (Effective Monitoring and Evaluation) is a component of North East Nigeria Transition to Development Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £961,151. This component benefits Nigeria, and works in the following sector(s): Research/scientific institutions. , with the following implementing partners: Baker Tilly Nigeria, Crown Agents Limited, Norwegian Refugee Council, Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 01-05-2017 and the end date is 30-04-2022.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)
